GSD.description:
loop: Check for overflow while configuring loop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit 13b2856037a651ba3ab4a8b25ecab3e791926da3. For more details please see the references link.
